Package index

Shortcuts

Prebuilt data access shortcuts

get3DEP()
Get USGS 3DEP DEMs
getBCCA()
Get BCCA data
getCABCM()
Get California Basin Characterization Model (CABCM) historical and projected climate and hydrology data.
getCHIRPS()
Get CHIRPS data
getDaymet()
Get Daymet Climate Data for an Area of Interest
getGLDAS()
Get GLDAS data
getGridMET()
Get GridMet Climate Data for an Area of Interest
getISRIC_soils()
Get World Soil Information gridded weather and climate data for historical (near current) conditions.
getLCMAP()
Get USGS LCMAP
getLOCA()
Get LOCA Climate Data for an Area of Interest
getLOCA_hydro()
Get LOCA Hydrology data
getLivneh()
Get Livneh data
getLivneh_fluxes()
Get Livneh Flux data
getMACA()
Get MACA Climate Data for an Area of Interest
getMODIS()
Get MODIS data
getNASADEM()
Get NASA Global DEM
getNLCD()
Get USGS National Land Cover Dataset
getNLDAS()
Get NLDAS data
getPRISM()
Get PRISM data
getTerraClim()
Get Terra Climate Data for an Area of Interest
getTerraClimNormals()
Get TerraClimate Normals for an Area of Interest
getVIC()
Get VIC data
getWorldClim()
Get WorlClim gridded weather and climate data for historical (near current) conditions.

Data Access

General tools for data access

climater_dap()
ClimateR dry run
climater_filter()
ClimateR Catalog Filter
dap()
Get Data (Data Access Protocol)
dap_crop()
Crop DAP file
dap_get()
Get DAP resource data
dap_meta()
Find DAP Metadata
dap_summary()
Print Summary Information About a OpenDAP Resource
dap_to_local()
Convert OpenDAP to start/count call
dap_xyzv()
Get XYTV data from DAP URL
.resource_grid()
Extract grid metadata from NC Pointer
.resource_time()
Extract time metadata from NC Pointer
extract_sites()
Extract Sites
get_data()
Get DAP Array
go_get_dap_data()
Read formated DAP URL as SpatRast
grid_meta()
Find DAP grid metadata
make_ext()
Convert catalog entry to extent
make_vect()
Make Vector
merge_across_time()
Merge List of SpatRaster's across time
parse_date()
Parse Dates from duration and interval
read_dap_file()
Read from a OpenDAP landing page
read_ftp()
Read from FTP
time_meta()
Find DAP time metadata
try_att()
TryCatch around RNetCDF::att.get.nc()
var_to_terra()
Variable Array to SpatRast
variable_meta()
Find DAP variable metadata
vrt_crop_get()
VRT Crop

Zarr Access

General tools for zarr access

.resource_grid_zarr()
Extract Grid Information from Zarr Resource
.resource_time_zarr()
Extract Time Information from Zarr Resource
go_get_zarr()
Retrieve data from a Zarr resource
read_zarr_file()
Read Zarr File
zarr_crop()
Crop Zarr Data to a Spatial and Temporal Subset
zarr_get()
Process and retrieve Zarr data as terra objects
zarr_to_terra()
Convert data to terra SpatRaster or data frame format
zarr_xyzv()
Extract Variable Information from Zarr Object

EarthData Access

General tools for configuring NASA EarthData Access

checkDodsrc()
Check dodsrc file
checkNetrc()
Check netrc file
getDodsrcPath()
Get a default dodsrc file path
getNetrcPath()
Get the default netrc file path
writeDodsrc()
Write dodsrc file
writeNetrc()
Write netrc file

Exported climateR-catalog

Parquet file exported to package dataset

catalog
ClimateR Catalog
read_live_catalog()
Read Live Catalog from Github release

Visualization

Parquet file exported to package dataset

animation()
Animate Object as GIF
animation_raster()
Animate SpatRast as GIF
animation_vector()
Animate vector as GIF
